title: TextToVideo | Create videos from text
introduction: The website offers a platform for generating video prompts for creative projects. Users can input specific prompts or criteria to generate unique video ideas.
features: Option to specify size, temperature, and level of imagination for the video
Ability to set a random seed for varied results

faqs.question: How can I use the website to generate video prompts?
faqs.answer: Simply input your desired criteria or prompts, such as size, temperature, and level of imagination, and the website will generate unique video ideas based on your inputs.

faqs.question: Is there a cost for using the video prompt generation service?
faqs.answer: No, the service is completely free to use.
